Message:
Long ago, the demon lord
tried to destroy the world.

With his overwhelming power,
the angels could do nothing
but seal him away.

That very same
demon lord is inside me,
but he has yet to regain
all his strength.

Now’s the time to use
my life to save the world.

I turned to meet those familiar,
gentle eyes for one last time.

I was only able to make it
this far because you were
always there for me.

So, I want to say
thank you.

A light as pure as snow
begins to pour out
from within me.

This single miracle
can make my wish—
my final wish—come true.

To use my life to
save the world.

I thought I was ready for
this to happen, but...

I knew it was wrong to
have fun saving the world.

At the very last second,
I was too weak to wish for
peace to come to the world...

Then, the miracle made
my wish come true.
